description:
With the new doc template the showing and hiding of the notification samples in the notification dev-ref[1] isn't working and therefore every sample shown by default that makes the document hard to read.

Most probably the html structure has been changed in a way that breaks the javascript doing the hiding. 

[1] https://docs.openstack.org/nova/latest/reference/notifications.html#existing-versioned-notifications
title: payload samples are not hidden in the notification devref by default

comments.content:
With the new doc template the showing and hiding of the notification samples in the notification dev-ref[1] isn't working and therefore every sample shown by default that makes the document hard to read.

Most probably the html structure has been changed in a way that breaks the javascript doing the hiding. 

[1] https://docs.openstack.org/nova/latest/reference/notifications.html#existing-versioned-notifications
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~balazs-gibizer

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/499963
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: stable/pike
Review: https://review.openstack.org/500100
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/500100
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=c01ca5444ae8008dd2f9a58ac23a602de14d84dc
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    stable/pike

commit c01ca5444ae8008dd2f9a58ac23a602de14d84dc
Author: Balazs Gibizer <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Sep 1 12:37:03 2017 +0200

    doc: fix show-hide sample in notification devref
    
    The new doc template includes jquery too late and therefore showing
    and hindig notification samples and auto hiding them by default doesn't
    work.
    
    This patch loads the jquery lib earlier for the notification devref.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1713974
    Closes-Bug: #1714363
    Change-Id: I07db4755c69d493e591761578d1077bb44acda41
    (cherry picked from commit 0499b280514dfd8592fe5564763ce7de62e9c96f)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 16.0.1 release.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
